lb:
[Torpedo Salvo] charges +1.
Clever upgraded to Level 2.
During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].

Increases [Torpedo Salvo] damage by 20%.
Clever upgraded to Level 3.
During Night Battle, increases all damage by 20%.

When a battle starts, launches 6 [Torpedo Salvo] in a V-shaped spread that deals 60% damage. Does not consume any [Torpedo Salvo] charges.
Clever upgraded to Level 4.

traits.name: Clever
traits.text: Reduces production time for  Sodas by 10%/15%/20%/25%

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from close range, reload time: 6s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name:
Torpedo Reserves
予備魚雷
text: [On Torpedo Salvo], 30% chance to immediately reload 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can only proc 3 times per battle.

skills.name:
Phantom Fleet
幻影艦隊
text: During a Day Battle, the enemy fleet will not attempt to attack the fleet Craven is in for 5 seconds, unless a [Torpedo Salvo] hits or [Main Battery Salvo] is fired
When battle starts, increases Allied Fleet Crit Rate by 15%. Every 5s thereafter, reduce the effect of this buff by 5% till 0%.

comment: Second of the four sisters of mischief and Gridley's loyal right-hand ship. Can usually be found behind Gridley throwing flower petals into the air for dramatic effect when Gridley is acting like a big shot.
